issue.title: [C++] Using better namespace style when using protobuf with Substrait
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17647](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17647). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment the namespace usage in Substrait is not consistent when it comes to using Protobuf classes in serialization and deserialization tasks. 

 

For example: 

Instead of `substrait::ReadRel_LocalFiles_FileOrFiles` use `substrait::ReadRel::LocalFiles::FileOrFiles`
